articles.title: Atletico Madrid crowned champions on dramatic final day in La Liga - European round-up - Sky Sports
articles.description: Atletico Madrid were crowned LaLiga champions for the first time in seven years after holding off the title challenge of city rivals Real to beat Valladolid.
